name: Kevin Levrone GOLD BCAA 2:1:1-30 servings
description:
Kevin Levrone GOLD BCAA 2:1:1-30 servings

GOLD BCAA 2:1:1. Food supplement. With sweeteners. A product that delivers branched-chain amino acids (BCAA) in 2:1:1 ratio, L-glutamine, citrulline malate, vitamins & electrolytes. The product is intended for people with increased physical activity.

Benefits

  • The high concentration of leucine has a positive effect on the functioning of the nervous system and reduces fatigue by increasing the ratio of bcaa to tryptophan
  • Facilitate quick muscle recovery after working out
  • Help build and protect the muscles from diminishment during weight loss
  • Ensures that your electrolytes are replaced as you sweat
  • Helps you maintain your edge through even the most intense workouts

Ingredients

BCAA complex (L-leucine, L-isoleucine, L-valine), L-glutamine, citrulline malate, vitamins and minerals premix [potassium citrate, magnesium citrate, sodium citrate, vitamin C (L-ascorbic acid), vitamin B6 (pyridoxine hydrochloride), vitamin B12 (cyanocobalamin)], flavourings, anti-caking agents, acidity regulators (malic acid, citric acid), colours, sweeteners (steviol glycosides, sucralose, acesulfame K). The measure included in the packet serves to facilitate portioning, but it does not guarantee precise dosing. It is advisable to use scales in order to measure out the exact amount.

Kevin Levrone GOLD BCAA 2:1:1-30 servings

  • Facilitate quick muscle recovery after working out
  • Help build and protect the muscles from diminishment during weight loss

Important information

Directions:

As a dietary supplement, mix each level scoop in 10-14 fl. oz. of water (adjust for taste preference) and shake well. On training days, consume 1 level scoop during exercise and 1 level scoop after exercise. On non-training days, consume 2 level scoops throughout the day. For best results, consume daily

name: RSP Nutrition BCAA 5000 Powder Post Workout and Muscle Recovery - 30 Servings
description:
RSP Nutrition BCAA 5000 , Lean Muscle Recovery - 30 Servings

Enhance Muscle Growth
BCAA supplementation paired with resistance training can lead to increased muscle protein synthesis and muscle growth.

Speed Up Recovery & Muscle Repair
BCAAs can reduce the breakdown of protein and muscle damage during exercise, thus protecting against muscle loss, decreasing soreness and speeding up muscle recovery.

Improve Athletic Performance
Supplementing with BCAAs as part of a resistance training program can result ion significant improvements in strength and performance.

Suggested Use

As a dietary supplement, take 1 scoop of BCAA 5000 Powder into 8-10 oz cold water, between meals, 30-45 minutes before workouts, and/or immediately after workouts. Consume 1 serving, 1-3 times daily.

Other Ingredients

Citric acid, maltodextrin, natural and artificial flavors, silica, sucralose, malic acid, acesulfame potassium, FD&C yellow #5, FD&C red #40.
short_description:
RSP Nutrition BCAA 5000 , Lean Muscle Recovery – 225 gms

  • Clean Active Nutrition
  • 5g Instantized BCAA
  • lean Muscle Growth
  • Athletic Performance
  • Recovery
  • Natural & Artificial Flavor
  • Third-Party Tested
  • 30 Total Servings
  • Quality Assurance
  • Dietary Supplement

name: RSP Nutrition, Regan BCAA , (264 gms)
description:
RSP Nutrition, Regan BCAA , (264 gms)

BOOST MUSCLE RECOVERY & INCREASE ENDURANCE – BCAAs have been shown to promote muscular endurance, decrease fatigue, and improve muscle recovery by playing a key role in stimulating protein synthesis. They are part of an optimal and essential post-workout routine for any active individual looking to recover faster from training. PROMOTE LEAN MUSCLE GROWTH – RSP BCAA 5000 plays a critical role in stimulating protein synthesis which is the process responsible for muscle growth and recovery. Furthermore, BCAAs have also been shown to help preserve existing muscle tissue and play an important part in the maintenance of immune system function.

Benefits

RSP Nutrition BCAA 5000 powder has been formulated using the research supported 2:1:1 BCAA ratio. BCAAs play a critical role in muscle protein synthesis and act as fuel during exercise. Not only is there scientific research supporting BCAAs for improving muscle recovery but they also have been shown to help preserve existing muscle tissue. Additionally, BCAAs play an important part in the maintenance of immune system function.

Ingredients

Citric acid, maltodextrin, natural and artificial flavours, silica, sucralose, malic acid, acesulfame k

Usage

  • As a dietary supplement, take 1 scoop of BCAA 5000 Powder blended into 8-10 oz water, between meals, 30-45 minutes before workouts, and/or immediately after workouts.
  • Consume 1 serving 1-3 times daily.
short_description:
RSP Nutrition, Regan BCAA , (264 gms)

  • Key Features:
    • Helps improve protein synthesis & nitrogen retention.
    • Accelerates muscle recovery and fatigue reduction.
    • Promotes lean muscle growth.

name: FA Core BCAA 8:1:1, 350 Gms
description:
FA Core BCAA 8:1:1, 350 Gms

  • Vitamin B6 Added - B6 is a water-soluble vitamin that your body needs for several functions. Your body cannot produce vitamin B6, so you must obtain it from foods or supplements. It is known to improve mood and reduce symptoms of depression. It also promotes brain health. It is also helpful in hemoglobin production.
  • Enriched with Beta Alanine, Citruline and Taurine - Taurine supports the physical and mental activity of the body. It increases the body's nitrogen balance, reduces muscle breakdown, muscle fatigue. Citrulline, brings significant benefits to all physically active people, professionals, and exercisers. It helps prevent aging. It supports development of muscles, reduces muscle fatigue, and helps your muscles work better during training. It is helpful in intensive short-term workouts.
  • SUPPORTS LEAN MUSCLE MASS - FA Core BCAA 8:1:1 has all the essentials BCAA post-workout powder promotes muscle development and maintenance while supporting lean muscle mass and reducing muscle breakdown. It can be taken before, after or during the workout. It does not contain any BANNED SUBSTANCES.
  • Country Of Origin - Poland. All Products contains Importer Sticker which has their direct number to confirm that the product is original and authentic. Be Original - Buy Original.
short_description:
FA Core BCAA 8:1:1, 350 Gms

  • Innovative Ratio 8:1:1 – Pure BCAA branched chain amino acids helps boosts muscle growth and metabolism. An optimal 8:1:1 ratio of L-Leucine, L-Isoleucine and L-Valine ensures you get noticeable results in your bodybuilding, endurance or powerlifting workouts.

name: Animal Spiked Aminos 210 gms
description:
Animal Spiked Aminos 210 gms

Aminos today are like what creatine was when it first hit the market. Today, both are proven staples in the arsenals of all serious, dedicated weightlifters who are looking to make gains day in and day out. Animal’s newest product, Spiked Aminos, uses the highest quality free form and instantized BCAAs and EAAs. This perfectly balanced ratio of aminos are more readily absorbed and utilized than regular, conventional aminos. You can use Animal Spiked Aminos any time during the day when you need a boost. As a training supplement, Animal Spiked Aminos can help before the workout (energy/focus), during the workout (performance/ergogenic), and even after the workout (recovery). Using Animal Spiked Aminos may help support optimal exercise performance, hydration and immune health.

  • Anabolic aminos (BCAA + EAA) “spiked” with energy, focus and clarity
  • “0” calories for maximum flexibility
  • Versatile–use it anytime you need a boost
  • Supports muscle growth, performance & recovery
  • Delicious flavor

Animal Spiked Aminos 210 gms

name: GNC AMP Gold Series BCAA, 400 gms
description:
GNC AMP Gold Series BCAA, 400 gms

Three amino acids

  • Leucine stimulates muscle growth and strength. It regulates blood sugar before and after exercise.
  • Valine prevents muscle breakdown during exercise and supports muscle metabolism and growth.
  • Isoleucine helps with energy production and increases nitrogen growth in muscle cells.

Three Other Important Nutrients

  • L-Citrulline can be recycled to arginine in the citrulline-NO cycle, in turn contributing to nitric oxide production.
  • Glutamine plays an important role in muscle function during and after exercise.
  • Vitamin B6 being the water soluble vitamin gets lose in sweat during strenuous exercise and training.
